alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; DeKalb (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:41PM CDT until June 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... Southwestern DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 440 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Savannah, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, Union Star, Clarksdale, Cosby, Amity and Helena. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 53 and 56. Interstate 229 near mile marker 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
